Text: Its official the sheriff in Tucson accurately explained that hate speech and voices who love to stir distrust with government has claimed more death...Thank you Rush Limbaugh you can add six more bodies to your death talk....END

"I think the vitriolic rhetoric that we hear day in and day out from people in the radio business and some people in the TV business and what (we) see on TV and how our youngsters are being raised, that this has not become the nice United States of America that most of us grew up in. And I think it's time that we do the soul-searching," the sheriff said.

jimpussy, thank you for making my point...I havent seen this article...Funny how it came from foxnews...I guarantee Rush Limbaugh will be covering his ass tomorrow.
